participant_1.background:
I'm going to sign up for a singing competition and show my parents that I can make a career out of it.
i play d and d.
i sleep most of the day.
Before I was a mom in telecommunications, I was a sniper in the army.
My mom would have been proud of me for talking my way out of the ticket.

participant_2.background:
I think it is fair to tax the rich more than the poor because they can afford it and it would help to reduce the disparity between the rich and the poor.
I would love to have lunch with a koala on my ranch.
I've been secretly watching baseball games all year, even though my parents don't like it.
I will tell my kids about my experience and inspire them to overcome their fears.
I wake up early and greet my family with a wagging tail.

content.text: Hi! How are you?
I'm good, thanks! How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks. I'm excited to sign up for a singing competition soon.
That's awesome! What kind of singing competition?
It's a local competition, but I'm hoping to win and make a career out of it.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! I hope so too.
What other hobbies do you have?
I play D&D and sleep most of the day.
D&D is fun! I've never been able to get into it, though.
It's definitely not for everyone. I like to sleep most of the day because I'm a mom and I work full-time.
That makes sense. I'm a stay-at-home dad, so I have a lot of time to do things during the day.
That's awesome! I'm sure your kids are really lucky to have you.
Thanks! They're my best friends.
Aww, that's sweet.
What was your mom like?
She was the best! She was always there for me and supported me in everything I did.
That's great! I'm glad you had a good mom.
Me too. She's the reason I'm so driven and ambitious.
That's awesome! I'm sure she's proud of you.
Thanks! I hope so.
I'm sure she is
